instructions:
Beat egg whites until stiff. Whisk eggs yolks in a large bowl and add flour, salt and pepper. Fold in
beaten egg whites and pour half into a greased 6 x 10 x 2 inch baking dish. Lay chilies flat over mixture then
cover with cheese slices. Pour remaining egg mixture over cheese. Bake in a 325 F oven for 25 minutes.
Cut in 4 pieces and serve with warmed taco or picante sauce. Serves 2.
ingredients: 1 can (4 oz) whole green chilies, halved lengthwise, seeded, rinsed and patted dry
6 oz mild taco or picante sauce
name: Chilies Rellenos
